title: Chuuhai Lemon: Love 30s - Ame ni Nurete mo
synopsis: Bug-eyed Katsumi (known as Chuhai to his friends) is a muscle-bound detective determined to use his strength and pig-headed stupidity to rescue his teenage girlfriend from a succession of embarrassing situations.
staff: [['Koizumi, Kenzou', ['Director', ' Storyboard', ' Character Design', ' Animation Director']], ['Buronson', ['Original Creator']], ['Fujino, Kouichi', ['Music']]]
